name: Project Puzzle Game Prototype
description: Hello, thank you for checking out my page. what is currently on this page is a prototype I am working on. hopefully in the near future I will have implemented more features. For example, more levels, a scoring system, better art, possible story line and many more.If you would like to help out please download the prototype and give some feedback, I'm always open to suggestions. Thank you again and see you around.
